text: Lloyd Harris was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Jannik Sinner won the title after defeating Alex Bolt 6–4, 3–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships – Men's Singles
